# FAQ (Continuously Updated, Contributions Welcome)

## Usage Issues

### ❓ Unable to Configure vLLM on Windows

​	vLLM currently does not support running on Windows. You can deploy it using WSL or Docker. For more details, refer to the README in the docker directory.

​	Detailed deployment documentation will be updated later.

### ❓ How to Resolve Garbled Text in Charts Generated by the Model?

​	The current default Chinese font is SimHei. Garbled text may occur due to font installation issues. You can resolve it by running the following commands:

```bash
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/StellarCN/scp_zh/master/fonts/SimHei.ttf
mkdir -p ~/.fonts
mv SimHei.ttf ~/.fonts/
rm -rf ~/.cache/matplotlib
```
